page.title: 02RECREATION FOR CHILDREN
page.content: Although there are many activities which have to be sought outside the area, Madeley does provide the population with a variety of recre- ational pursuits. {Clubs and courses for children} Brownies, cubs and scouts meet in the village schools. A pre-school play group is held in the village hall. The hall is also used in conjunction with the comprehensive school to provide venues for youth clubs and discos. There is a swimming pool at Madeley College which is open to the public at certain times. 'Lads and Dads' football games take place at the Manor Road football ground. There is also a BMX track pro- vided, and quite a number of children go fishing at Madeley Pool.
